video_title: You Need To Let Go Of Your Vengeance
transcript:
and so what is it that people do anytime
something bad happens to them their mind
steps in and does all kinds of crap with
it either you devalue it oh there's some
silver lining it's okay in the end where
it only it doesn't kill you only makes
you stronger this stuff this stuff this
stuff or what happens is you're like
yeah I deserved it right like I deserve
to be hurt so that's why like that's how
you make sense of it and what we really
need to do is like when bad stuff
happens to you it happens to you it has
nothing to do with what your value as a
human being it has nothing to do with
anything it's just there's no excuse
there's no reason there's no positivity
it is just and it happened to you you
don't deserve it someone else is an
 you can sometimes get overly
focused on them to try to make it right
right so he's like oh they hurt me and
I'm gonna hurt them and then what
happens is you keep that hurt alive
every time you chase that person because
that's your fuel baby and so even if you
end up with vengeance you pay the price
